LoginSamlSSO.Title: Saml Configuration
LoginSamlSSO.Description: Here you can change the settings for Saml SSO Plugin.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlAttributeKey: Name of attribute from <Response> which plugin should use as user login.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlServiceProviderEntityId: Identifier of the SP entity. (must be a URI)
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlServiceProviderNameIDFormat: Specifies the constraints on the name identifier to be used to represent the requested subject.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlServiceProviderAssertionConsumer: URL Location where the <Response> from the IdP will be returned. This plugin supports endpoint for the HTTP-POST binding only.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlServiceProviderPublicCertificate: Absolute path to public x509 certificate of the SP.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlServiceProviderPrivateKey: Absolute path to private key of the SP.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlIdentityProviderEntityId: Identifier of the IdP entity. (must be a URI)
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlIdentityProviderSingleSignOnServ: SSO endpoint info of the IdP. (Authentication Request protocol) URL Target of the IdP where the Authentication Request Message will be sent.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlIdentityProviderPublicCertificat: Absolute path to public x509 certificate of the IdP.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlIdentityProviderPrivateKey: Absolute path to private key of the IdP.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlSecurityAuthnRequestsSigned: Indicates whether the <samlp:AuthnRequest> messages sent by this SP will be signed.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlSecurityWantMessagesSigned: Indicates a requirement for the <samlp:Response> elements received by this SP to be signed.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlSecurityWantAssertionsSigned: Indicates a requirement for the <saml:Assertion> elements received by this SP to be signed.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlSecurityWantNameIdEncrypted: Indicates a requirement for the NameID received by this SP to be encrypted.
LoginSamlSSO.HelpSamlLogLevel: Level for logger. Available levels: error, warning, info, debug. (in order of importance, default: warning)
